overview: Mom, you are hiding your yellow star beneath your bag in front of Gestapo. During the liberation of Paris, you hold into your arms a jewish woman, hidden just as you under a false identity. Thinking of this pictures of my movies, I understand that telling the story of my family during the war is questioning my jewishness. Therefore, I asked my family and my friends what it means to be a jew nowadays.
title: Se nommer Juif aujourd'hui encore
